title: Emerald Drops Diamond Chandbali Earrings - పాంచాలి చెవి దుద్దులు
materials: Pear Cut Emeralds. Hyderabadi Polish for lasting shine.
features: Chandbali design featuring a cluster of round diamonds on top and pear-cut diamond setting cascading down to meet a vibrant emerald drop. The rose gold setting enhances the brilliance of the diamonds and contrasts beautifully with the rich green of the emeralds. Features a secure screw-back closure.
occasions: or festive occasions. These earrings will add a touch of elegance to any outfit.
description: A timeless combination of diamonds and emeralds, these Chandbali earrings are handcrafted by skilled artisans, ensuring exceptional quality and design. The Hyderabadi polish ensures lasting brilliance. A perfect blend of classic design and contemporary elegance, making it a cherished addition to any jewelry collection.
